description: The vendor will be responsible for the supply, delivery, and installation of the multifunction printers as well as provide training to the client in both English and French. The contract will be for 60 months with the option to extend for two 1-year periods.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Call for Bids

#### Tender Number and Reference

* English: 2BP2-123049
* French: 2BP2-132049
* Reference Number: SSC-22-00020514:T

#### Status

* Tender status: Expired
* Closing Date: 2022-12-01 14:00:00
* Amendment Number: 3
* Amendment Date: 2022-11-22

#### Contract Detail

* Contract Type: Lease
* Duration: 60 months
* Options: 2 one-year extensions
* Equipment: Colour Wide Format Multifunction Printer
* Services: Supply, delivery, installation, training, and necessary support
* Language: Bilingual (English and French)
* Delivery Location: British Columbia

#### Solicitation Detail

* Solicitation Number: BPM017205/20514
* Publication Date: 2022-10-21
* Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia

Note: Links are furnished for download reference purposes on the Shared Services website. Original text has extra links that I have removed here. Same would go for French.

### Contact Information

* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
* End User Entities: Shared Services Canada
* Contact Person: Katherine Ikeson
* Contact Email: [katherine.ikeson@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:katherine.ikeson@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: 613-298-2147
* Contact Fax: 613-123-4567

### Trade Agreements

* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

Note: Review the attached documents linked above and contact information for tender details. Also, the bidder is expected to adhere to all relevant Canadian trade agreements. -The technical writer

This rewritten entry is cleaner, and more concise with proper headings, and relevant details
